最新消息請留意#2 回覆！

送上HKBN Marketing Team 老細電郵，
想親自同佢溝通亦得～
Email: samuel.hui@hkbn.com.hk, kim.hue@hkbn.com.hk

Dear Mr. HUI & Mr. HUE,

Formal complaint against bundled contract of myTV SUPER

I am writing to lodge a formal complaint against HKBN regarding the bundled contract of myTV SUPER box.

As one of the loyal customers of your company, network service provided by HKBN is highly appreciated and is reputable among the industry. However, the bundled contract of installing myTV SUPER box is an unreasonable agreement, if not absurd, to force customers paying for undesirable installations.

Recently, controversy on extradition bill sparked shockwaves among society and escalated to a large-scale social campaign. Instead of upholding Code of Ethics of journalists, TVB adopted the approach of distortion, news suppression and censorship. Unfairness, inaccuracy and conjecture is now the image presented by the news of TVB.

Being a company serving Hong Kong citizens, I believe HKBN is an enterprise which will always stand with us. Reviewing the bundled terms will not only benefit the customers but also the image of HKBN. I herewith strongly urge HKBN to WITHDRAW the bundled terms of installing myTV SUPER and I will consider advance termination of contract as one of my options if the suggestion above is not accepted.

Thank you and I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Yours sincerely,
A HK citizen and a HKBN customer

送上HKBN Marketing Team 老細電郵，
想親自同佢溝通亦得～
Email: samuel.hui@hkbn.com.hk, kim.hue@hkbn.com.hk

Dear Mr. HUI & Mr. HUE,

Formal complaint against bundled contract of myTV SUPER

I am writing to lodge a formal complaint against HKBN regarding the bundled contract of myTV SUPER box.

As one of the loyal customers of your company, network service provided by HKBN is highly appreciated and is reputable among the industry. However, the bundled contract of installing myTV SUPER box is an unreasonable agreement, if not absurd, to force customers paying for undesirable installations.

Recently, controversy on extradition bill sparked shockwaves among society and escalated to a large-scale social campaign. Instead of upholding Code of Ethics of journalists, TVB adopted the approach of distortion, news suppression and censorship. Unfairness, inaccuracy and conjecture is now the image presented by the news of TVB.

Being a company serving Hong Kong citizens, I believe HKBN is an enterprise which will always stand with us. Reviewing the bundled terms will not only benefit the customers but also the image of HKBN. I herewith strongly urge HKBN to WITHDRAW the bundled terms of installing myTV SUPER and I will consider advance termination of contract as one of my options if the suggestion above is not accepted.

Thank you and I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Yours sincerely,
A HK citizen and a HKBN customer

Dear Mr. HUI & Mr. HUE,

Formal complaint against bundled contract of myTV SUPER

I am writing to lodge a formal complaint against HKBN regarding the bundled contract of myTV SUPER box.

As one of the loyal customers of your company, network service provided by HKBN is highly appreciated and is reputable among the industry. However, the bundled contract of installing myTV SUPER box is an unreasonable agreement, if not absurd, to force customers paying for undesirable installations.

Recently, controversy on extradition bill sparked shockwaves among society and escalated to a large-scale social campaign. Instead of upholding Code of Ethics of journalists, TVB adopted the approach of distortion, news suppression and censorship. Unfairness, inaccuracy and conjecture is now the image presented by the news of TVB.

Being a company serving Hong Kong citizens, I believe HKBN is an enterprise which will always stand with us. Reviewing the bundled terms will not only benefit the customers but also the image of HKBN. I herewith strongly urge HKBN to WITHDRAW the bundled terms of installing myTV SUPER and I will consider advance termination of contract as one of my options if the suggestion above is not accepted.

Thank you and I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Yours sincerely,
A HK citizen and a HKBN customer
